post.summary: Sync connection with an API token.

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: by default two weeks ago, format YYYY-MM-DD
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: by default two weeks ago, format YYYY-MM-DD

post.summary: Import and overwrite an external asset with an API token.

parameters.name: request_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the request from /suggest
schema.title: Request Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the request from /suggest

post.description:
1) creates a new token with secrets.token_hex(32)
2) stores the hashed token in the user document (overwrites existing token)
3) returns the token to the user

get.summary: Get Eval Questions By Run Timestamp

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for the external asset.

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: Subtype of the external asset, such as 'looker_dashboard'.

folder.title: Folder
folder.description: Folder path where the external asset is stored.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the external asset.

url.title: Url
url.description: Full URL of the external asset.

active.title: Active
active.description: Indicates if the external asset is active.

view_count.title: View Count
view_count.description: Number of times the external asset has been viewed.

last_accessed_at.title: Last Accessed At
last_accessed_at.description: Timestamp of the last access to the external asset.

dot_description.title: Dot Description
dot_description.description: Formatted text description of the external asset, can e.g. include a markdown representation of all charts in a dashboard.
